<title level="1" right="Trait">[Aberration](/Traits.aspx?ID=1)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 628 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Aberrations are creatures from beyond the planes or corruptions of the natural order.
name: Aberration
